pages.title: Runes
pages.text: $(br)Casting some spells consumes $(key)runes$().$(br2)You can craft $(key)runes$() directly in your hand, or build a $(key)Rune Crafting Altar$() to craft more $(key)runes$() with the same ingredients.

pages.title: Spell Infinity
pages.text: $(br)The $(key)Spell Infinity$() enchantment makes casting spells consume no $(key)runes$().
